title: Ottmanz7
author: Ottmanz7
content: https://www.blockchain.com/search/?search=8808be39e1871e610ae95560c17d33f6880b7a18534da79827f4524ec3357a3d&https://www.blockchain.com/search/?search=e71948d708b74facc2b8343a8622af8713bf56aa9ac2ec24e3ec3dcd0744fb11&https://www.blockchain.com/search/?search=087ff537674ef77a599a7e73c176a16f0b6de6e336bc3db7e8319c019f685df0&https://www.blockchain.com/search/?search=027ea4ce4d186fc2d07c52f6f9501dcd317529afd0a905d34029e28e9587fee1With all Blockchain Explorer the TXID is not displayed only with Blockchain.com you can do something there e.g. Add B Fee`s some said this is not possible with blockchain.com. I've also tried adding my XPUB to another wallet where you can add fees, but that doesn't work either, XPUB from Blockchain unfortunately doesn't work with most wallet programs, who can help me. I'm willing to pay for that too.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 11:34:23 AM__SNIP__Blockchain.com doesn't support any of the rebroadcast or transaction boost systems built-in. My Suggestion is please wait for the lowering of mempool it is the easy way for you. If you want to go for the Acceleration of the transaction you understand the possible risks as no one can guarantee the transaction confirmation in the next block.For the rest of the problem as you cant see in the transaction details on other Blockchains I think it has something to do with the Synchronization and indexing in this case as well you can possibly wait only. I am wondering how you got stuff but it's not a rare thing as well sometimes it happens, Did you try custom fees ?Sorry I haven't experienced it as much so I can say you should wait, otherwise my Senior Fellows can guide you on it.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 11:34:23 AMWith all Blockchain Explorer the TXID is not displayed only with Blockchain.com you can do something there e.g. Add B Fee`s some said this is not possible with blockchain.com. I've also tried adding my XPUB to another wallet where you can add fees, but that doesn't work either, XPUB from Blockchain unfortunately doesn't work with most wallet programs, who can help me. I'm willing to pay for that too.What is xPub and how do I get it?xPub is extended Public key and you can use it to create your receiving address for receiving. You can not sign any transaction to move your coins. You only can sign transaction with a private key.You can get Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase for your blockchain.com wallet and import it into Electrum wallet.You can bump the fee with Electrum too.How to restor Blockchain.com wallet into Electrumhttps://electrum.org/

You can not sign any transaction to move your coins. You only can sign transaction with a private key.You can get Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase for your blockchain.com wallet and import it into Electrum wallet.You can bump the fee with Electrum too.How to restor Blockchain.com wallet into Electrumhttps://electrum.org/and this will really work or better wait? XPUB from blockchain.com really work with Electrum? and Electrum they dont need very long to download the full blockchain?

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 12:00:06 PMand this will really work or better wait? XPUB from blockchain.com really work with Electrum? and Electrum they dont need very long to download the full blockchain?If you still have access to your Blockchain.com wallet, you can go to Security and get its Secret Private Key Recovery Phrase and import it into Electrum.I added a link to an article that helps you with steps to import seed into Electrum wallet.Why hasn't my transaction confirmed yet?. Problems with your transactions.How your wallet worksQuoteYour Backup Phrase is made up of 12 random words, and is an encoded version of your master seed (and an industry standard). It acts as a backup and allows you to access your bitcoins and ether regardless of the wallet software you’re using. In the event that you lose your password, or choose to use another wallet provider, your Backup Phrase is all you need to regain access to your funds.Quick tip: You can find your 12 word Backup Phrase in your Security Center after creating your wallet. Write this phrase down and keep it somewhere safe.Seed phrase, explained

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 12:00:06 PMand this will really work or better wait? XPUB from blockchain.com really work with Electrum? and Electrum they dont need very long to download the full blockchain?Looks like you misunderstood the brother's point, Electrum is a lightweight wallet, it doesn't require downloading the whole data, So don't be afraid of the storage and hardware resources. You can customize the fees with Electrum (in Pending transactions). All in all, you need the Key.Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 12:00:06 PMand this will really work or better wait?If you can afford the additional fees then bro why not, otherwise waiting is a wise option as well.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 12:00:06 PMElectrum they dont need very long to download the full blockchain?As our friend explained, you won't have to download and store the full Bitcoin blockchain on your device with Electrum wallet that is SPV.Quote from: Hamza2424 on June 14, 2023, 12:04:16 PMLooks like you misunderstood the brother's point, Electrum is a lightweight wallet, it doesn't require downloading the whole data, So don't be afraid of the storage and hardware resources.You can connect your Electrum wallet to servers and use it immediately. No need to wait for days, hours or few minutes to sync your wallet like Bitcoin Core.Electrum uses Simple Payment Verification technique.QuoteSimple Payment Verification (SPV) is a technique described in Satoshi Nakamoto’s paper. SPV allows a lightweight client to verify that a transaction is included in the Bitcoin blockchain, without downloading the entire blockchain. The SPV client only needs download the block headers, which are much smaller than the full blocks. To verify that a transaction is in a block, a SPV client requests a proof of inclusion, in the form of a Merkle branch.SPV clients offer more security than web wallets, because they do not need to trust the servers with the information they send.Reference: Bitcoin: A peer-to-peer Electronic Cash System

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: RBF is not enabled, so you cannot bump the tx fees for these transactions, though you can use ViaBTC transaction accelerator to get it confirmed faster, just submit your transaction id here.I don't know what the fee rate was when these tx's were broadcasted, but the tx fees used are not too low and they have been in the mempool for somedays now, from https://mempool.space/, high priority is ~ 30 sats/vByte right now, i guess it should be confimed soon if the fee rate doesn't go up too much.

comments.author: Ottmanz7
comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on June 14, 2023, 12:12:51 PMRBF is not enabled, so you cannot bump the tx fees for these transactions, though you can use ViaBTC transaction accelerator to get it confirmed faster, just submit your transaction id here.I don't know what the fee rate was when these tx's were broadcasted, but the tx fees used are not too low and they have been in the mempool for somedays now, from https://mempool.space/, high priority is ~ 30 sats/vByte right now, i guess it should be confimed soon if the fee rate doesn't go up too much.thank you, then i have only 1 option: waiting...how long its need you think?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Z-tight on June 14, 2023, 12:12:51 PMRBF is not enabled, so you cannot bump the tx fees for these transactions, though you can use ViaBTC transaction accelerator to get it confirmed faster, just submit your transaction id here.I don't know what the fee rate was when these tx were broadcasted, but the tx fees used are not too low and they have been in the mempool for somedays now, from https://mempool.space/, high priority is ~ 30 sats/vByte right now, i guess it should be confimed soon if the fee rate doesn't go up too much.What I am surprised about is that the transactions are all not valid transactions. All other explorers like Blockstream.info, Blockchair.com and mempool.space all see the transactions as invalid transactions. I tried to pump the transactions on ViaBTC free accelerator, they are also not valid. I will advice him to import the seed phrase on Electrum. Probably he will see his coins and be able to spend it.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: Ottmanz7 on June 14, 2023, 12:15:33 PMthank you, then i have only 1 option: waiting...how long its need you think?I think there is something wrong with your transactions, just like Charles-Tim said, i tried to paste your tx id on ViaBTC and it says the tx id does not exist.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: If the receiver wallet is yours, you can then try CPFP (child pays for parent). I think it is the better approach since RBF is disabled.  Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 14, 2023, 12:16:39 PMQuote from: Z-tight on June 14, 2023, 12:12:51 PMRBF is not enabled, so you cannot bump the tx fees for these transactions, though you can use ViaBTC transaction accelerator to get it confirmed faster, just submit your transaction id here.I don't know what the fee rate was when these tx were broadcasted, but the tx fees used are not too low and they have been in the mempool for somedays now, from https://mempool.space/, high priority is ~ 30 sats/vByte right now, i guess it should be confimed soon if the fee rate doesn't go up too much.What I am surprised about is that the transactions are all not valid transactions. All other explorers like Blockstream.info, Blockchair.com and mempool.space all see the transactions as invalid transactions. I tried to pump the transactions on ViaBTC free accelerator, they are also not valid. Is it possible that the transaction was dropped? Quote from: Charles-Tim on June 14, 2023, 12:16:39 PMI will advice him to import the seed phrase on Electrum. Probably he will see his coins and be able to spend it.I hope the receiving address is owned by OP, that way he can use the CPFP approach.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: lionheart78 on June 14, 2023, 12:21:42 PMIs it possible that the transaction was dropped? This can happen if you sign a transaction but you did not broadcast it. But wondering how it is valid on blockchain.com explorer while not valid on other blockchain explorers.The fee rates used are high, over 30 sat/vbyte. The last transaction was on 13th which was just yesterday, while the first transaction was 10th of this month, four days ago. The mempool has not been that congested some weeks ago. I do not think the transactions dropped, but OP is trying to do something not possible, or maybe the fault is from the wallet he is using. He should import the seed phrase into Electrum wallet instead, spend the coins. He should generate new seed phrase on Electrum and abandon Blockchain.com seed phrase.
